metadata.title: CVE-2018-5690 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in admin/users.php in Dotclear2.12.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the nb parameter (aka the page limit number).

criterions.comment: dotclear: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
